alert.note: Alert for Guilford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 4:06PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Davidson, northern Randolph and southern Guilford Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 405 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thomasville, or near High Point, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... High Point, Asheboro, Randleman, Thomasville, Archdale, Trinity, Pleasant Garden, Liberty, Ramseur and Franklinville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
